Description:
Bachelor degree in Business Administration specifically in Marketing, Sales, Commercial business.
Minimum 5 years in Car Rental or Automotive, including at least 2 years of managerial / leading experience in Car Rental Operations, Sales & Marketing & Business Development. 
Strong knowledge of Business development.
Strong relationship builder externally & internally.
Negations & Interpersonal skills, and the ability to interact with internal and external customers. Effective in working with people with different cultures and values.
Excellent communication skills.
Able to work under pressure and within a team.
Strong governance and problem-solving skills.
Sales Prompt: understanding & analyzing of the business market and competition.
Analytical skills. * Budgeting & Promotional sales skillsJob Details
